cast.name: 彼得·麦卡拉姆 Peter McAllum

introduction: The natural world is full of marvels: from the highest mountains to the deepest lakes on earth. In this 6 x 1 hour series we take a look at the most iconic natural wonders on the planet. The world's greatest mountains, rivers, lakes, forests, volcanoes, caves, waterfalls and more...From Africa's great Savannah Lands to the active volcano on Tanna; from Mt Everest to the Great Barrier Reef; from Croatia's lush forests and jaw-dropping waterfalls to America's iconic Grand Canyon, this series is set to inspire nature lovers the world over.
